mapper.update:
update xd_product_order
resources_id = #{resourcesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_code = #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cmt = #{cmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salesman_id = #{salesmanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update xd_product_order set resources_id = #{resourcesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_code = #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cmt = #{cmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salesman_id = #{salesmanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select t1.id AS id,t1.business_code AS businessCode,t1.resources_id AS resourcesId,t1.`code`AS code,t1.`name` AS name, t1.price AS price, t1.create_user_id AS createUserId,t1.create_time AS createTime,t1.update_user_id AS updateUserId, t1.update_time AS updateTime,t1.del_flag AS delFlag, t1.type_id AS typeId,t1.cmt AS cmt from xd_product_order t1 LEFT JOIN xd_resources_base t2 on t1.resources_id=t2.resources_id AND t2.customer_phone=#{customerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
LIMIT #{page},#{pageSize}
